languages.text:
Targets become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the target successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} this grenade, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect instead.
languages.original_text:
Обездвиживает цели на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Если цели удается {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g}, она получает {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Targets become immobilised for 1 round.
If the target successfully dodges this grenade, it suffers the slowed effect instead.

Targets become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the target successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} this grenade, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect instead.

languages.text:
Обездвиживает цели на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Если цели удается {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g}, она получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g}.

Targets become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the target successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} this grenade, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect instead.

traits.locale_text:
Обездвиживает цели на 1 раунд.
Если цели удается уклониться, она получает эффект замедления.

Обездвиживает цели на 1 раунд.
Если цели удается уклониться, она получает эффект замедления.

languages.text:
使目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
如果目标{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}了手雷的影响，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}效果。
languages.original_text:
Targets become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the target successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} this grenade, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect instead.

traits.locale_text:
使目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
如果目标避开了手雷的影响，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。

languages.text:
ターゲットを、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}にする。
ターゲットがこの手榴弾を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}できると、代わりに{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}効果を受ける。
languages.original_text:
Targets become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the target successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} this grenade, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect instead.

traits.locale_text:
ターゲットを1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}にする。
ターゲットがこの手榴弾を回避できると、代わりに{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を付与。

languages.text:
Los objetivos quedan {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}.
En cambio, si el objetivo consigue {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} esta granada, sufrirá el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Targets become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the target successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} this grenade, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect instead.

traits.locale_text:
Los objetivos quedan {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}.
En cambio, si el objetivo consigue esquivar esta granada, sufrirá el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}.

languages.text:
Ziele werden {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}, und zwar für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.
Sollte das Ziel dieser Granate erfolgreich {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g}, erleidet es stattdessen den {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g}-Effekt.
languages.original_text:
Targets become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If the target successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} this grenade, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect instead.

traits.locale_text:
Ziele werden {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}, und zwar für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.
Sollte das Ziel dieser Granate erfolgreich ausweichen, erleidet es stattdessen den {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g}.

languages.text:
La cible subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Si elle parvient à {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} cette grenade, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}.

If the target successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} this grenade, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect instead.

traits.locale_text:
La cible subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Si elle parvient à esquiver cette grenade, elle subit l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}.
